Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Allows municipalities to accept retroactive applications for real property tax exemptions from certain veterans
Summary: Allows municipalities to accept retroactive applications for real property tax exemptions from certain veterans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to allowing municipalities to accept retroactive applications for real property tax exemptions from certain veterans
